item.description:
Event Description: SHIRLEY LEWIS PACKS THE HOUSE!!!!

COST: cover charge $10.00


NOTE** Tables will be reserved for our group. IF YOU QUESTION THE NEIGHBORHOOD? I felt very safe. The last time we were there, being women, as we went to leave, we were followed out to our cars by their security....... without even having to ask! Parking is not a problem. They have VALET prkg. Also, 2 + lots.

****Some of us will be meeting up earlier for dinner @ Pho Dakao. INTERESTED?
I hope to see you there
_Jo
item.how_to_find_us: Tables will be reserved for our group towrd the back. Please look for the meetup logo.
item.why: Shirley Lewis is the best! SHE PACKS THE HOUSE!!!!
item.name: SHIRLEY LEWIS tonight @ Gilrein's
